CustomField.description: These field generates the IATI Sector Vocabulary Code based on the value selected in the ampi__Vocabulary__c picklist field.
CustomField.formula: CASE(TEXT(ampi__Vocabulary__c), 'OECD DAC CRS Purpose Codes (5 digit)', 1, 'OECD DAC CRS Purpose Codes (3 digit)', 2, 'Classification of the Functions of Government (UN)', 3, 'Statistical classification of economic activities in the European Community', 4, 'National Taxonomy for Exempt Entities (USA)', 5, 'AidData', 6, 'SDG Goal', 7, 'SDG Target', 8, 'SDG Indicator', 9, 'Humanitarian Global Clusters (Inter-Agency Standing Committee)', 10, 'Reporting Organization', 99, 'Reporting Organization 2', 98, null )
CustomField.label: Vocabulary Code
